snippet: Though it could have cost him millions, Graeme McDowell didn’t hesitate to call a penalty on himself last week at the BMW Championship.
abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column remarks on the willingness of professional golfers to call penalties on themselves for unintentionally breaking arcane rules, even when the infractions give them no advantage.
lead_paragraph: Though it could have cost him millions, Graeme McDowell didn’t hesitate to call a penalty on himself last week at the BMW Championship.

headline.seo: In Golf, Rules Are Rules. Even the ‘Stupid’ Rules.
headline.main: In Golf, Rules Are Rules. Even the ‘Stupid’ Rules.
